name: Call Rus Tributes
description:
Dispatch 4 Rus Tributes from the Golden Tent and increase the cost of the Call Rus Tributes by +300 Stone.
The cost of Call Rus Tributes will be reduced by 10 Stone every 30 seconds. Each Military Building will reduce the cost by an additional 5 Stone up to a maximum of 70 Stone. Will automatically deploy the Rus Tributes when the cost reaches zero.
